quote: I am God, la de dah.
author: Anne Sexton,  The Complete Poems

quote: Donde no hay libros hace frío. Vale para las casas, las ciudades, los países. Un frío cataclismo, un páramo de amnesia
author: María Elena Walsh

quote: No hay caminos para la paz; la paz es el camino.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: HASTA LA VICTORIA SIEMPRE
author: Ernesto Che Guevara,  Che Guevara Speaks

quote: La cucaracha, La cucaracha, Ya no puede caminar, porque no tiene, porque le falta, I don't know the rest, la la la la!
author: Simone Elkeles,  Rules of Attraction

quote: Verde que te quiero verde. Verde viento. Verdes ramas. El barco sobre la mar y el caballo en la montaña.
author: Federico García Lorca

quote: La vida es una larga caída ,Marcus. Lo mas importante es saber caer
author: Joël Dicker

quote: Cuando tu alma está preparada, las cosas también lo están.
author: William Shakespeare,  Henry V

quote: In California, I do like to just chill out and go to the beach, but I love the energy here. I feel very productive when I'm in New York.
author: Ashley Greene

quote: Quiero hacer contigo lo que la primavera hace con los cerezos
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: La tristesse durera toujours.[The sadness will last forever.]
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: I like my coffee like Colfax Avenue mixed with Atlantic Boulevard, and if you're buying then I'm driving. Let's sip this romance slowly.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: El que lee mucho y anda mucho, ve mucho y sabe mucho.
author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra,  El ingenioso hidalgo Don Quijote de La Mancha

quote: Lo que sabemos es una gota de agua; lo que ignoramos es un océano.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: 88. People wonder why so many writers come to live in Paris. I’ve been living ten years in Paris and the answer seems simple to me: because it’s the best place to pick ideas. Just like Italy, Spain.. or Iran are the best places to pick saffron. If you want to pick opium poppies you go to Burma or South-East Asia. And if you want to pick novel ideas, you go to Paris.
author: Roman Payne,  Crepuscule

quote: ISE LO GUN ISE.
author: RIDWAN AKOTUN

quote: la propriété, c'est le vol!
author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon,  Théorie de la propriété

quote: Il n'y a de réalité que dans l'action.(There is no reality except in action.)
author: Jean-Paul Sartre,  Existentialism Is a Humanism

quote: Hollywood is a place where they'll pay you a thousand dollars for a kiss and fifty cents for your soul. I know, because I turned down the first offer often enough and held out for the fifty cents.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Almost everything strange washes up near Miami.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: In Hollywood, no one knows anything.
author: William Goldman

quote: Adrian, I'm on a date. Why are you here? On my car?
author: Richelle Mead,  The Golden Lily

quote: Ya no la quiero, es cierto, pero tal vez la quiero.Es tan corto el amor, y es tan largo el olvido.
author: Pablo Neruda,  Twenty Love Poems and a Song of Despair

quote: London, thou art the flower of cities all!
author: William Dunbar

quote: Y, entonces, en ese instante que tan solo dura un segundo, el cerebro se encarga de abrir la cerradura del cofre en el cual guardas todo lo que aprecias. Cede de tal manera que la tapa se abre y todo lo que hay en el interior sale de forma tan rápida y tan fugaz que no puedes detenerlo.
author: Audrey Dry,  Sin mirar atrás

quote: The human digestive tract is like the Amtrak line from Seattle to Los Angeles: transit time is about thirty hours, and the scenery on the last leg is pretty monotonous.
author: Mary Roach,  Gulp: Adventures on the Alimentary Canal

quote: La lectura, asegura, ampliaría mi experiencia del mundo. Las ideas que se encuentran en los libros serios darían profundidad a mis pensamientos sobre cada decisión que tomo.
author: Sena Jeter Naslund

quote: GPS for Sin "You've entered the point of no return;Re-cal-cu-la-ting.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Caminante, no hay puentes, se hace puentes al andar. (Voyager, there are no bridges, one builds them as one walks.)
author: Gloria E. Anzaldúa

quote: Escóndeme en tus brazospor esta noche sola,mientras la lluvia rompecontra el mar y la tierrasu boca innumerable.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: I'm at that place I grew up to leave.
author: Adrian C. Louis,  Fire Water World: Poems

quote: I've never even been to Long Island
author: Meg Cabot,  Jinx

quote: Un libro leído a medias es una aventura amorosa incompleta.
author: David Mitchell,  Cloud Atlas

quote: El buen lector es que tiene casi constantemente la impresión de que no se ha enterado bien.
author: José Ortega y Gasset

quote: Soap?""School of America in Paris"he explains. "SOAP".Nice. My father sent me here to be cleansed.
author: Stephanie Perkins,  Anna and the French Kiss

quote: Where are you? HereWhat time is it? NowWhat are you? This moment.
author: Dan Millman,  Way of the Peaceful Warrior: A Book That Changes Lives

quote: In Paris they just simply opened their eyes and stared when we spoke to them in French! We never did succeed in making those idiots understand their own language.
author: Mark Twain,  The Innocents Abroad

quote: La memoria es como libro en el cual se escribe toda nuestra vida. Algunas veces deseamos cerrarlo y olvidarlo para no recordar todos los escabrosos detalles, y otras veces deseamos abrirlo y observarlo detenidamente, queriendo volver a sentir lo mismo que sentimos en aquel momento.
author: Audrey Dry,  Sin mirar atrás

quote: Non est ad astra mollis e terris via"- "There is no easy way from the earth to the stars
author: Seneca

quote: Forget the place you're trying to get to and see the beauty in right now...
author: Evanescence

quote: French name, English accent, American school. Anna confused.
author: Stephanie Perkins,  Anna and the French Kiss

quote: This city belongs to ghosts, to murderers, to sleepwalkers. Where are you, in what bed, in what dream?
author: Marguerite Yourcenar

quote: Kansas Haiku "Ya' know Superman'sfrom here and Jor-El could'vesent him to New York.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Wherever you are, be there with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you don't know where you're going, you drive on the highway.
author: Roger Hedden,  Bodies, Rest and Motion.

quote: À l'aurore, armés d'une ardente patience, nous entrerons aux splendides Villes. (In the dawn, armed with a burning patience, we shall enter the splendid Cities.)
author: Arthur Rimbaud,  Season in Hell & Other Poems

quote: La Récolteuse de la Mort Je suis la Récolteuse de la Mort et ~vous êtes ce que je viens pour les!
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Para ser grande, sê inteiro: nadaTeu exagera ou exclui.Sê todo em cada coisa. Põe quanto ésNo mínimo que fazes.Assim em cada coisa a Lua todaBrilha, porque alta vive.
author: Ricardo Reis

quote: Yo soy carne muerta. Translation: I am dead meat.
author: Kiersten White,  Paranormalcy

quote: Wherever there's hope there's a trial.
author: Haruki Murakami,  1Q84
